= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *VBA.RT* || Retina || Spatial decorrelation through center surround inhibition || 100:1 cones/rods to ganglion cells aggregation ||
|| *VBA.SC* || Superior Colliculus || Direct behavioral responses toward specific points in egocentric space, <BR>induce saccadic eye movement || Superficial layers are sensory-related, <BR>deep layers are motor-related ||
|| *VBA.TH.LGN* || Lateral Geniculate Nucleus || Temporal decorrelation || Only 10% of inputs to LGN come from the retina. <BR>90% are modulatory inputs from cortex and the brainstem ||
|| *VBA.TH.PI* || Inferior Pulvinar || Dorsal Stream || Thalamus ||
|| *VBA.TH.PL* || Lateral Pulvinar || Ventral Stream || Thalamus ||
|| *VBA.OCN* || Oculomotor Nucleus || Change Eye Direction || ||
|| *VBA.EWN* || Edinger-Westphal Nucleus || Change Eye Pupil || ||
